-%0A    def arrive(self, kid: Kid):%0A        self.waiting.insert(0, kid) # inserir um elemento em uma posi%C3%A7%C3%A3o especifica da lista%0A%0A    def enter(self):%0A        if len(self.waiting) %3E 10:%0A            kid = self.playing.pop()%0A            self.playing.insert(0, kid)%0A%0A    def leave(self):%0A        if len(self.playing) %3E 0:%0A            kid = self.playing.pop()%0A            self.playing.insert(0, kid)%0A%0A%0A    def __str__(self) -%3E str:%0A        espera = %22, %22.join(str(x) for x in self.waiting)%0A        jogar = %22, %22.join(str(x) for x in self.playing)%0A%0A        return f%22%5B%7Bespera%7D%5D =%3E %5B%7Bjogar%7D%5D%22%0A    %0Adef main()%0A    pular = Trampoline()%0A%0A    while True:%0A        line = input()%0A        print(%22$%22 + line)%0A        args: list%5Bstr%5D = line.split(%22 %22)%0A%0A%0A        if args%5B0%5D == %22end%22:%0A            break%0A        elif args%5B0%5D == %22show%22:%0A            print(pular)%0A        elif args%5B0%5D == %22arrive%22:%0A            n = args%5B1%5D%0A            a = int(args%5B2%5D)%0A%0A            pular.arrive(Kid(n, a))%0Amain()
